name: INSearchForMediaIntentResponseCode
desc: Codes returned by an intents handler in response to a search request.

items.name: case ready
items.desc: The app is ready to perform the search.

items.name: case continueInApp
items.desc: The system should launch your app in the foreground to search for the media.

items.name: case inProgress
items.desc: The app is currently trying to process the search request.

items.name: case success
items.desc: The app successfully performed the search.

items.name: case failure
items.desc: The app is unable to search for the media.

items.name: case failureRequiringAppLaunch
items.desc: The user needs to launch your app to search for the media.
